title: "Robot caterpillar demonstrates new approach to locomotion for soft robotics"
excerpt: "Researchers at North Carolina State University have demonstrated a caterpillar-like soft robot that can move forward, backward and dip under narrow spaces. The caterpillar-bot's movement is driven by a novel pattern of silver nanowires that use heat to control the way the robot bends,"
